name: Python
body:
### Welcome to Tinitiate Python tutorials
* Learn Python by examples where the notes are code comments.
* Read notes and comments in the code and run the code as is. 

##PYTHON INSTALLATION
* Python - Installation on Windows
* Python - IDEs

##PYTHON BASICS
* Python - Basics and Printing
* Python - Variables and Operators
* Python - Strings
* Python - Lists
* Python - Tuples
* Python - dictionary
* Python - Convert dictionary to Tuple to List
* Python - If Else (Conditional Decision Statements)
* Python - Loops (Iterative Control)
* Python - Functions
* Python - Function Arguments Types
* Python - Function Pass by value Pass by Reference
* Python - Modules
* Python - Packages
* Python - User Input
* Python - Executing OS Commands
* Python - File IO
* Python - Exceptions

##PYTHON-ADVANCED
* Python - Object Oriented programming
* Python - Class Built-in Attributes
* Python - Class Built-in Functions
* Python - Decorators with functions
* Python - Decorators with function arguments
* Python - OOP Inheritance
* Python - Iterators and Generators
* Python - Regular Expressions Basics
* Python - Regular Expressions Patterns
* Python - Multithreading
* Python - Thread synchronization
* Python - Thread Communication
* Python - Database Connection using cx-Oracle Module
* Python - XML DOM Parsing
* Python - XML SAX Parsing
* Python - Sending Email
* Python - Logging Messages

##PYTHON-PACKAGES
* Python package Manager PIP Installation

### Authors and Contributors
Venkata Bhattaram / tinitiate.com
